questions.question: What is the highest energy efficiency rating depicted on this rectangular label, prominently displayed and featuring various colored bars?

What brand is explicitly mentioned on the label as the source of the energy efficiency information?
What is the shape of the primary energy efficiency rating indicator, which is noticeably larger than others on this label?
Excluding the A++ rating, what is the color of the bar representing the next highest efficiency rating, A+?
What is the lowest energy efficiency rating represented by the smallest red bar in the descending efficiency scale?
What is the unit of energy consumption indicated at the bottom of this rectangular energy label?
What is the numerical value of energy consumption, in the specified unit, indicated at the bottom of the label?
What is the overall background color of the border surrounding the entire energy efficiency rating information?
What is the color of the smaller label at the top right corner next to the main ENERGY label?
What kind of text is displayed, apart from the letter grades, indicating the purpose of the information on this label?
What color is the text stating the brand name, located in the central section of the label?
Besides the main rating indicator, what is the shape of the bar representing each of the secondary energy efficiency rating grades?
What is the general style of the label, combining graphic and text elements conveying energy ratings?
What is the material of the label, considering the standard appearance of energy efficiency ratings?
